General.Name: Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and decoration business in China. It is involved in the design and construction of architectural decorations and curtain walls; and solar photovoltaic power generation and construction installation activities. The company undertakes public infrastructure, hotel and club, finance and securities, business entertainment and office, transportation facilities, and exhibit hall and theater construction projects. It also offers electromechanical engineering, fire protection, landscape, and intelligent technology services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Ruihe Decoration Engineering Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

5.Name: Mr. Bo  Xu
